sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Card, Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CartContext } from '../context/CartContext'; // Assuming you have a CartContext const OrderConfirmationPage = ({ order }) => { const { cartItems } = useContext(CartContext); // Use CartContext to fetch item prices if missing // Helper to get item price if missing const getItemPrice = (productId) => { const cartItem = cartItems.find((item) => item.productId === productId); return cartItem ? cartItem.price : 'N/A'; }; return (

Order Confirmation
Order Details

Order ID: {order._id}

Status: {order.status}

Total Amount: ${order.total.toFixed(2)}

Delivery Address

{order.deliveryAddress.street}

{order.deliveryAddress.city}, {order.deliveryAddress.state} {order.deliveryAddress.zip}

Items
{order.items.map((item) => ( ))}
Product ID Product Name Quantity Price
{item.productId} {item.productName || 'N/A'} {item.quantity} {item.priceSell ? `$${item.priceSell.toFixed(2)}` : `$${getItemPrice(item.productId)}`}
); }; export default OrderConfirmationPage;
